column4: guys, how do i install packages without internet connection? (i need pppoe)
do you have the package on CD or anything?
i have the Xubuntu 7.04 cd (and the ubuntu 7.04 cd).
if you can find the file (e.g. by find /mnt/cdrom -iname '*pppoe*') then you can install the package with "sudo dkpg -i <pkgname.deb>"
